phrase.item: Flowers are blooming, it is the time of youth, life is moving, but I am unaware.
The sweet fruits of youth have ripened, but I am unaware.
A gardener is thinking of each flower in the garden, but the flower doesn't know.
Oh, its brief young life faded, and I am unaware.
I could say, the years are passing too fast and it is not what I want!
The way of life is like that, life is moving and I am unaware.
Once I was a child, I did not care about the world.
How my childhood passed, I don't know, and I am unaware.
In life, this youth will pass without leaving a name or sign.
One should be very scared of this kind of passing, and I am unaware.
If you remember, Ariman came and took Salimon's land
When will she value herself and the ring, I am unaware.
Hey Saodacho, you are young now, enjoy being young.
Youth will pass and only memories will stay, and I am unaware.
